title: Tempura squid and prawns with coriander salsa
description: A quick fun way to serve delicious seafood in crisp batter with a fresh, spicy salsa dressing.
ingredients: 2 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
1 small handful coriander leaves, roughly chopped
1 small handful mint leaves, roughly chopped
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
